parameters.name: MediaPipelineId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline that you want to get.

nested_items.name: MediaPipeline
nested_items.description: The media pipeline object.

nested_items.name: MediaCapturePipeline
nested_items.description: A pipeline that enables users to capture audio and video.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineId
nested_items.description: The ID of a media pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the media capture pipeline.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: Source type from which media artifacts are saved. You must use ChimeMeeting.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the source from which the media artifacts are saved.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the media pipeline.

nested_items.name: SinkType
nested_items.description: Destination type to which the media artifacts are saved. You must use an S3 Bucket.

nested_items.name: SinkArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the destination to which the media artifacts are saved.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the pipeline was created, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the pipeline was updated, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: ChimeSdkMeetingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for a specified media pipeline. SourceType must be ChimeSdkMeeting.

nested_items.name: SourceConfiguration
nested_items.description: The source configuration for a specified media pipeline.

nested_items.name: SelectedVideoStreams
nested_items.description: The selected video streams for a specified media pipeline. The number of video streams can't exceed 25.

nested_items.name: AttendeeIds
nested_items.description: The attendee IDs of the streams selected for a media pipeline.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ExternalUserIds
nested_items.description: The external user IDs of the streams selected for a media pipeline.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ArtifactsConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for the artifacts in an Amazon Chime SDK meeting.

nested_items.name: MuxType
nested_items.description: The MUX type of the audio artifact configuration object.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the video artifact is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: MuxType
nested_items.description: The MUX type of the video artifact configuration object.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the content artifact is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: MuxType
nested_items.description: The MUX type of the artifact configuration.

nested_items.name: CompositedVideo
nested_items.description: Enables video compositing.

nested_items.name: Layout
nested_items.description: The layout setting, such as GridView in the configuration object.

nested_items.name: Resolution
nested_items.description: The video resolution setting in the configuration object. Default: HD at 1280 x 720. FHD resolution: 1920 x 1080.

nested_items.name: GridViewConfiguration
nested_items.description: The GridView configuration setting.

nested_items.name: ContentShareLayout
nested_items.description: Defines the layout of the video tiles when content sharing is enabled.

nested_items.name: PresenterOnlyConfiguration
nested_items.description: Defines the configuration options for a presenter only video tile.

nested_items.name: PresenterPosition
nested_items.description: Defines the position of the presenter video tile. Default: TopRight.

nested_items.name: ActiveSpeakerOnlyConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for an ActiveSpeakerOnly video tile.

nested_items.name: ActiveSpeakerPosition
nested_items.description: The position of the ActiveSpeakerOnly video tile.

nested_items.name: HorizontalLayoutConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for a horizontal layout.

nested_items.name: TileOrder
nested_items.description: Sets the automatic ordering of the video tiles.

nested_items.name: TilePosition
nested_items.description: Sets the position of horizontal tiles.

nested_items.name: TileCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of video tiles to display.

nested_items.name: TileAspectRatio
nested_items.description: Specifies the aspect ratio of all video tiles.

nested_items.name: VerticalLayoutConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for a vertical layout.

nested_items.name: TileOrder
nested_items.description: Sets the automatic ordering of the video tiles.

nested_items.name: TilePosition
nested_items.description: Sets the position of vertical tiles.

nested_items.name: TileCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of tiles to display.

nested_items.name: TileAspectRatio
nested_items.description: Sets the aspect ratio of the video tiles, such as 16:9.

nested_items.name: VideoAttribute
nested_items.description: The attribute settings for the video tiles.

nested_items.name: CornerRadius
nested_items.description: Sets the corner radius of all video tiles.

nested_items.name: BorderColor
nested_items.description: Defines the border color of all video tiles.

nested_items.name: HighlightColor
nested_items.description: Defines the highlight color for the active video tile.

nested_items.name: BorderThickness
nested_items.description: Defines the border thickness for all video tiles.

nested_items.name: CanvasOrientation
nested_items.description: The orientation setting, horizontal or vertical.

nested_items.name: SseAwsKeyManagementParams
nested_items.description: An object that contains server side encryption parameters to be used by media capture pipeline. The parameters can also be used by media concatenation pipeline taking media capture pipeline as a media source.

nested_items.name: AwsKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key you want to use to encrypt your media pipeline output. Decryption is required for concatenation pipeline. If using a key located in the current Amazon Web Services account, you can specify your KMS key in one of four ways:
Use the KMS key ID itself. For example, 1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab.
Use an alias for the KMS key ID. For example, alias/ExampleAlias.
Use the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the KMS key ID. For example, arn:aws:kms:region:account-ID:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab.
Use the ARN for the KMS key alias. For example, arn:aws:kms:region:account-ID:alias/ExampleAlias.

nested_items.name: AwsKmsEncryptionContext
nested_items.description: Base64-encoded string of a UTF-8 encoded JSON, which contains the encryption context as non-secret key-value pair known as encryption context pairs, that provides an added layer of security for your data. For more information, see KMS encryption context and Asymmetric keys in KMS in the Key Management Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: SinkIamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the sink role to be used with AwsKmsKeyId in SseAwsKeyManagementParams.

nested_items.name: SelectedVideoStreams

nested_items.name: Sinks
nested_items.description: The connector pipeline's data sinks.

nested_items.description: The sink configuration's sink type.

nested_items.description: The sink configuration's RTMP configuration settings.

nested_items.description: The URL of the RTMP configuration.

nested_items.description: The audio channels set for the RTMP configuration.

nested_items.description: The audio sample rate set for the RTMP configuration. Default: 48000.

nested_items.description: The connector pipeline's ID.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the connector pipeline was last updated.

nested_items.name: MediaConcatenationPipeline

nested_items.description: The ID of the media pipeline being concatenated.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the media pipeline that you specify in the SourceConfiguration object.

nested_items.name: Sources
nested_items.description: The data sources being concatenated.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of concatenation source in a configuration object.

nested_items.name: MediaCapturePipelineSourceConfiguration
nested_items.description: The concatenation settings for the media pipeline in a configuration object.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_items.description: The media pipeline ARN in the configuration object of a media capture pipeline.

nested_items.name: ChimeSdkMeetingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The meeting configuration settings in a media capture pipeline configuration object.

nested_items.name: ArtifactsConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for the artifacts in an Amazon Chime SDK meeting concatenation.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: The configuration for the data channel artifacts concatenation.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_items.description: The configuration settings for an Amazon S3 bucket sink.

nested_items.description: The status of the concatenation pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsPipeline
nested_items.description: The media insights pipeline of a media pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineId
nested_items.description: The ID of a media insights pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a media insights pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsPipelineConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a media insight pipeline's configuration settings.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a media insights pipeline.

nested_items.name: KinesisVideoStreamSourceRuntimeConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for a Kinesis runtime video stream in a media insights pipeline.

nested_items.name: Streams
nested_items.description: The streams in the source runtime configuration of a Kinesis video stream.

nested_items.name: StreamArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the stream.

nested_items.name: FragmentNumber
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the fragment to begin processing.

nested_items.name: StreamChannelDefinition
nested_items.description: The streaming channel definition in the stream configuration.

nested_items.name: NumberOfChannels
nested_items.description: The number of channels in a streaming channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelDefinitions
nested_items.description: The definitions of the channels in a streaming channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelId
nested_items.description: The channel ID.

nested_items.name: ParticipantRole
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the audio in a channel belongs to the AGENT or CUSTOMER.

nested_items.name: MediaEncoding
nested_items.description: Specifies the encoding of your input audio. Supported format: PCM (only signed 16-bit little-endian audio formats, which does not include WAV)

nested_items.name: MediaSampleRate
nested_items.description: The sample rate of the input audio (in hertz). Low-quality audio, such as telephone audio, is typically around 8,000 Hz. High-quality audio typically ranges from 16,000 Hz to 48,000 Hz. Note that the sample rate you specify must match that of your audio.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsRuntimeMetadata
nested_items.description: The runtime metadata of a media insights pipeline.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: KinesisVideoStreamRecordingSourceRuntimeConfiguration
nested_items.description: The runtime configuration settings for a Kinesis recording video stream in a media insights pipeline.

nested_items.name: Streams
nested_items.description: The stream or streams to be recorded.

nested_items.name: StreamArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the recording stream.

nested_items.name: FragmentSelector
nested_items.description: Describes the timestamp range and timestamp origin of a range of fragments in the Kinesis video stream.

nested_items.name: FragmentSelectorType
nested_items.description: The origin of the timestamps to use, Server or Producer. For more information, see StartSelectorType in the Amazon Kinesis Video Streams Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: TimestampRange
nested_items.description: The range of timestamps to return.

nested_items.name: StartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The starting timestamp for the specified range.

nested_items.name: EndTimestamp
nested_items.description: The ending timestamp for the specified range.

nested_items.name: S3RecordingSinkRuntimeConfiguration
nested_items.description: The runtime configuration of the Amazon S3 bucket that stores recordings in a media insights pipeline.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The URI of the S3 bucket used as the sink.

nested_items.name: RecordingFileFormat
nested_items.description: The file format for the media files sent to the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the media insights pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: ElementStatuses
nested_items.description: The statuses that the elements in a media insights pipeline can have during data processing.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of status.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The element's status.

nested_items.name: MediaStreamPipeline
nested_items.description: Designates a media pipeline as a media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineId
nested_items.description: The ID of the media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the media stream pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the media stream pipeline was updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: Sources
nested_items.description: The media stream pipeline's data sources.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of media stream source.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the meeting.

nested_items.name: Sinks
nested_items.description: The media stream pipeline's data sinks.

nested_items.name: SinkArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Kinesis Video Stream pool returned by the  CreateMediaPipelineKinesisVideoStreamPool API.

nested_items.name: SinkType
nested_items.description: The media stream sink's type.

nested_items.name: ReservedStreamCapacity
nested_items.description: Specifies the number of streams that the sink can accept.

nested_items.name: MediaStreamType
nested_items.description: The media stream sink's media stream type.
